La socia agradece la oportunidad del préstamo que le permitirá invertir en el negocio y crecer económicamente.
texts.en:
Matilde belongs to the communal bank "EL PROGRESO".  This bank is located 3 hours from the city of Cuzco, in the Quispicanchis district, Ocongate province, Cuzco state. 

Matilde is 31 years old and married.  She buys and sells baby animals.  She purchases guinea pigs, chickens, hens, pigs, and sheep, then raises and fattens them, and sells them when they are ready for sale.  She wants to use this loan to purchase animals such as sheep, guinea pigs and chickens.  She is thankful for the opportunity this loan provides for her to invest in her business and grow economically.

loans.use: to purchase animals such as sheep, guinea pigs, and chickens.

loans.name: Aboubacar

texts.fr: Boubacar est un jeune célibataire qui tient une épicerie dans sa ville. Son activité lui permet de soutenir sa famille dans la prise en charge des dépenses d'alimentation, de santé et de frais de scolarité des ses deux frères élèves.Afin d'améliorer la qualité de ses produits, il sollicite un pret de 350000f auprès de l'UIMCEC pour acheter 1 congélateur.Son ambition est de se lancer dans la vente de poisson frais.
texts.en:
Boubacar is a young single man who manages a grocer's shop in his town. His business allows him to support his family by taking care of food and healthcare expenses as well as the school fees of his two student brothers. 

In order to improve the quality of his products, he is requesting a loan of 350,000f from the UIMCEC to buy a freezer. His goal is to go into selling fresh fish.

loans.use: to buy one freezer.

loans.name: Ndéye

texts.fr: Ndèye est une femme mariée qui vit avec son mari et ses 6 garçons et 4 filles. Elle exerece un commerce de produits alimentaires qu'elle propose à ses clients sur une grande table installée devant sa maison. Elle parvient à obtenir chaque jour des revenus dont une bonne partie est allouée aux dépenses alimentaires du lendemain.Son activité lui permet également de soutenir son mari dans la prise en charge des frais sanitaires et scolaires des enfants. Afin d'augmenter son fonds de commerce, elle sollicite auprès de UIMCEC un pret de 150000f pour acheter des sacs d'arachide, de mil et d'autres produits divers de consommation courante. Son ambition est de construire une grande boutique devant son domicile.
texts.en:
Ndèye is married and lives with her husband and her six sons and four daughters. She sells food products, that she displays for her customers on a large table in front of her house. 

Every day, she manages to get an income, and she employs most of it to cover the food expenses for the following day. Her business also enables her to support her husband in taking care of the healthcare and school expenses of the children.

In order to bolster her working capital, she's seeking a loan of XOF 150'000, to be used to buy sacks of peanuts and millet, and other food staples.

She ambitions to build a large shop in front of her home.

loans.use: to buy sacks of peanuts and millet, and other food staples

loans.name: Mildred

texts.en: Mildred is 40 years old, married and has two children who are 12 and 16 years old. She also supports an additional dependent who helps her run her business. In 2007, she opened a shop where she sells food and cosmetics. She did this to increase her income and now earns Le 1,300,000 by working seven days a week, 16 hours a day. She is applying for a loan for Le 3,000,000 to buy new items to sell to her customers. Her goal is to become a successful international businesswoman. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to buy more food and cosmetics to sell to her customers.

loans.name: Luz

texts.es: Luz, de 24 años de edad, es una mujer trabajadora  y emprendedora, con muchas ganas de salir adelante. Convive con Richard quien es mototaxista, pero vive con él y sus dos hijos de 7 y 2 años de edad, además de sus suegros, cuñados y dos sobrinos habitando la casa de sus suegros. La actividad que realiza Luz es la venta de ropa de diversos modelos para damas, caballeros y niños, mercadería que compra en la ciudad de Lima. Lleva realizando este negocio desde hace 03 años contando con el apoyo de su pareja en la búsqueda de nuevos clientes. Por otro lado, poseen un mototaxi, vehículo conducido por él, generándose así más ingresos mutuos. Le gusta su negocio pues le permite contar con un ingreso económico como independiente además de tener un oficio en el cual pueda mantenerse ocupada. Tiene planes de hacer crecer su negocio ampliando el volumen de sus compras y ventas, diversificando sus productos. Este será el préstamo número 04 con la institución MFP, por tanto espera de su colaboración, para continuar con sus objetivos. Además de sentirse a gusto con el trabajo de su banco comunal pues siente el apoyo mutuo y la solidaridad de sus integrantes. Con el monto solicitado de 3000 soles lo invertirá en la compra de más ropas a precio por mayor, asimismo darle mantenimiento técnico a su mototaxi.
texts.en:
Luz is 24 years old.  She is a hardworking and entrepreneurial woman, who really wants to get ahead.  She lives with Richard, a motorcycle taxi driver, and their two children, ages 7 and 2.  They live in a house with her mother and father in-law, brother and sister-in-law, and two nephews.

Luz sells a variety of clothes for women, men and children.  She purchases her merchandise in Lima.  She has had this business for 3 years and Richard helps her find new customers.  They have a motorcycle taxi, which he drives, which increases their income. She likes her business because it provides an independent income and a profession that keeps her busy.  She plans to grow her business by increasing the volume of purchases and sales and diversifying her products.  This will be her 4th loan with MFP, and she hopes that with their help she will continue to make progress on her goals.  She is happy with the work her communal bank does because she feels the mutual support and solidarity of its members.  With the 3000 soles that she has requested, she will purchase more clothing at wholesale prices and do maintenance on the motorcycle taxi.

loans.use: to purchase more clothing and do maintenance on her motorcycle taxi.

loans.name: Wilmer

texts.es:
Wilmer tiene 29 años de edad, es casado hace 5 años,  tiene 2 hijos de 3 y 2 años, y vive con su familia en la colonia 4 de enero de Olanchito, Yoro.
Wilmer tiene desde hace 5 años un negocio de venta de accesorios, repuestos y reparación de celulares, se motivo a establecer su propio negocio ya que el sabia realizar este oficio y también porque en la zona donde el vive no contaba con negocios que ofrecieran este tipo de servicio.  Este negocio actualmente tiene bastante demanda. Ofrece este servicio todo el día. 
El ha obtenido varios préstamos que le han ayudado a mantener el negocio, y ahora esta solicitando el cuarto préstamo para comprar accesorios y repuestos para la reparación de celulares. Con las ganancias el podrá seguir reinvirtiendo para  hacer crecer su negocio.
texts.en:
Wilmer is 29 years old and has been married for five years. He has two children, ages 3 and 2. Wilmer lives with his family in the January 4th subdivision in Olanchito, Yoro.

Five years ago, Wilmer started a business of selling mobile phone parts and accessories, as well as performing phone repairs. He was motivated to start his own business because he was already in this line of work. Also, there were no businesses that offered this type of service in the area where he lives. His business currently has enough demand. He offers his services every day.

Wilmer has obtained several loans that have helped to sustain his business. Now he is requesting his fourth loan in order to buy accessories and spare parts for mobile phone repairs. With the income that he will earn, Wilmer can reinvest so that he can grow his business.

loans.use: to buy mobile phone accessories and parts.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy additional items to sell to her customers.

loans.name: Geofrey

texts.en: Geofrey is married and has eight children who range in age from 5 to 30 years old. He describes himself as responsible, humble and creative, and earns a living by running a butcher shop where he sells meat. He has been in this line of work for 25 years and has been successful because his shop is in an urban area. His main problem is a lack of storage space for his meat. He is applying for a loan for Kes 20,000 to buy supplies for his store. His goal is to own several butcher shops in the next five years.

loans.use: to buy more meat for a butcher shop.

loans.name: Francisco

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “EL PROGRESO”; este banco se encuentra situado a tres horas de la misma ciudad del Cusco, en el Distrito de Quispicanchis de la Provincia de Ocongate Departamento de Cusco.
El socio Francisco; El socio tiene 48 años de edad; El socio es casado, El socio se dedica a la extracción de la minería de manera formal, el socio es minero artesanal quiere decir que los minerales y piedras preciosas las vende en bruto a los diferentes compradores, el socio es un hombre muy trabajador que gracias al empeño y esfuerzo que pone en su trabajo el brinda a su familia una buena calidad de vida y desea darles estudios y posibilidades de surgir en la vida. El socio desea el crédito para invertir en el transporte y en pulir algunas piedras para la venta.
El socio agradece la oportunidad del préstamo que le permitirá invertir en el negocio y crecer económicamente.
texts.en:
Francisco belongs to the communal bank “EL PROGRESO”.  This bank is located 3 hours from the city of Cuzco, in the Quispicanchis district, Ocongate province, Cuzco state. 

Francisco is 48 years old and married.  He is a miner.  He is an artisanal miner which means that he sells minerals and precious stones to different buyers.  He is a very hardworking man.  Thanks to the dedication and effort he applies to his work he is able to provide his family with a good quality of life. He hopes to provide them with an education and the possibility of getting ahead in life.

He is requesting a loan to invest in his vehicle and to polish stones for sale.  He is thankful for the loan as it allows him to invest in his business and grow economically.

loans.use: to invest in his vehicle and to polish stones for sale.

loans.name: Cerelina

texts.en: Cerelina is 44 years old and lives in the Philippines with her husband and four children. For the last 10 years, she has earned a living by running a shop where she sells canned goods, snacks and beverages. She is applying for a loan for 10,000 to buy more items to sell to her customers. She joined HSPFI last year as a way to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy more items to sell to her customers.

loans.name: Maria Elena

texts.es:
La Señora. María es socia del banco comunal El Aguacate, vive por un hermoso sector de la ciudad de Cuenca, esta ciudad es conocida como la Santa Ana de los 4 Ríos, desde Diciembre de 1999 es Patrimonio Cultural de la Humanidad, cuenta con una gran riqueza natural y cultural, su gente mantiene la cultura y tradiciones de sus pueblos.

La Señora. María tiene 24 años, vive en unión libre y ha concebido 2 hijos de 4  y 2 años de edad. Su esposo labora en un taller de latonería (arreglo de latas de vehículos), no tiene casa propia por lo que viven arrendando.

Ella es profesional en el estilismo y ahora se encuentra ejerciendo su profesión, labora de lunes a sábados desde las 9 a de la mañana hasta las 8 de la noche. Está instalando un gabinete de belleza propio y es para eso que ha pedido es crédito.

Este es su primer crédito que realiza en el banco comunal al cual fue invitada por su mamá. El dinero de su crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de productos como: tintes de cabello, shampoo, esmaltes, laca de cabello, gel, cosméticos, etc. para iniciar con su gabinete.
 
Su meta iniciar con su gabinete y crecer en su negocio.
texts.en:
Señora María is a member of the communal bank El Aguacate.  She lives in a beautiful part of the city of Cuenca.  This city is known as Santa Ana de los 4 Ríos [Santa Ana of the 4 Rivers] and is a World Hertiage Site as of December 1999.  It has great cultural and natural wealth and the residents maintain the culture and traditions of their people.  

Señora María is 24 years old and lives in a common law marriage which has produced 2 children ages 4 and 2.  Her husband works in an auto body shop (repairing vehicle exteriors).  She rents as she doesn't own her own home.  

She is a professional stylist and is currently practicing her profession. She works Monday through Saturday from 9 in morning until 8 at night.  She is installing her own beauty cabinet and it is for this reason that she is requesting this loan.  

This is her first loan with the communal bank.  She was invited to join by her mother.  She will use the money from the loan to buy products such as hair dyes, shampoo, polish, hair spray, gel, cosmetics, etc., to stock her cabinet.  Her goal is to stock her cabinet and grow her business.

loans.use: purchase hair dyes, shampoo, polish, hair spray, gel, cosmetics, etc.

loans.name: Marie Madeleine

texts.fr:
Madame Marie Madeleine, mariée et mère de 3 enfants fait du commerce de chaussures et de sacs depuis trois ans. Elle travaille aussi comme ménagère  dans une Paroisse de la ville.
Le prêt va lui permettre d’acheter des  chaussures et des sacs de la Gambie pour venir le revendre  dans le quartier. Elle possède une clientèle fidèle qui fait sa commande avant qu’elle ne fasse le déplacement  ce qui lui fait gagner du temps.
Marie Madeleine n’a pas de charges, elle a la chance d’avoir un époux qui s’occupe entièrement des dépenses quotidiennes du foyer. Son bénéfice lui permet de diversifier  ses produits.
texts.en:
Marie Madeleine, married and mother to 3 children, has been trading in shoes and bags for three years. She also works as a housekeeper in a parish of the town.

The loan will allow her to buy shoes and bags from Gambia to come resell them in the neighborhood. She has a loyal clientèle who orders before she travels which saves her time.

Marie Madeleine has no dependents, she is lucky to have a spouse who completely takes care of the household's daily expenses. Her profit will allow her to diversify her products.

loans.use: to buy shoes and bags to resell.

loans.name: Babacar

texts.fr: Babacar est un jeune de 29 ans, qui exerce le métier de chauffeur de taxi.Il est célibataire et vit avec sa mère et ses deux petits frères depuis le décès de son père. Avec les revenus tirés de son activité, il parvient à subvenir aux besoins essentiels de la famille et à épargner une partie à l'UIMCEC. Aujourd'hui, il sollicite un pret de 300000f pour compléter son capital afin d'acheter un nouveau taxi. Son ambition est de se lancer dans la culture de l'arachide et du mil.
texts.en:
Babacar, age 29, is a young man who works as a taxi driver. He's single and has been living with his mother and his two younger brothers since the death of his father.

With the income generated by his business, he manages to provide for his family's essential needs, and to put some money away at UIMCEC. 

He's now seeking a loan of XOF 300'000 in order to complete his working capital and buy a new taxi.

He ambitions to start cultivating peanuts and millet.

loans.use: to buy a new taxi

loans.name: Helen

texts.en: Helen is a 59-year-old widow who lives in the Philippines with her three children. For the last five years, she has earned a living by running a retail shop where she sells canned goods, snacks and beverages. She is applying for a loan for 10,000 to buy more items to sell to her customers. She joined HSPFI last year as a way to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy more items to sell to her customers.

loans.name: Manuel Antonio

texts.es:
Manuel, vive con su esposa y tres hijos, vive en casa familiar, él se dedica a atender una discomóvil para animar fiestas y eventos sociales, lleva varios años en esta actividad, trabaja solo por contrataciones.
Él está solicitando un préstamo para la compra  de un equipo de sonido, en la cual instala todos los CD de las mezclas para las fiestas, con esto estará mejorando el sonido para hacer mejor los eventos.
El objetivo de Manuel es tener en un futuro una discomóvil mejor, con más capacidad, para amenizar los eventos y así ganar más clientes.
texts.en:
Manuel lives with his wife and three children in the family home.  He manages a portable discotheque [jukebox] used to entertain at parties and social events.  He’s been in this business for several years and works exclusively based on contracted services.

He is asking for a loan to buy sound equipment in which he installs all the CDs he makes with blended music for the parties.  With this, he’ll be improving the sound to make the events better.  Manuel’s objective in future is to have a better portable discotheque with more capacity to entertain at events to thus win over more customers.

loans.use: to buy sound equipment.

loans.name: Babacar

texts.fr:
Le client s’appelle Babacar, il  est marié et père de famille. Il s’active dans le transport depuis 8 ans comme chauffeur de taxi.
Le prêt va lui permettre d’acheter des amortisseurs pour son véhicule Renauld ce qui va lui permettre de mieux travailler.
Il aimerait dans l’avenir acquérir un autre véhicule.
texts.en:
The client is named Babacar. He is married and father to a family. He has been active in transport for 8 years as a taxi driver.

The loan will allow him to buy shock absorbers for his Renauld vehicle which will allow him to work better.

In the future he would like to buy another vehicle.

loans.use: to buy shock absorbers for his taxi.

loans.name: Loty

texts.es: Loty, de 32 años de edad, es una mujer trabajadora empeñosa y decidida con muchas ganas de salir adelante. Es soltera, vive en compañía de su padre, madre, sus hermanos, a los que quiere mucho, viviendo cómodamente en la casa de sus padres. La actividad que realiza Loty es la venta de ropa de diferentes modelos y para todos los géneros. Dicho negocio lo realiza por temporadas, enviando su capital a su hermana que vive en ciudad de Lima quien compra la mercadería solicitada por sus clientes. Por otro lado, tiene una bodega de abarrotes, que instaló en su casa, donde atiende a sus vecinos y personas que concurren a su tienda. Durante estos 3 años de trabajo, siempre ha contado con el apoyo de su madre en la atención de su bodega. Le gusta su negocio pues, le genera ingresos económicos para pagarse sus gastos personales y apoyar a sus padres en los gastos de su hogar, además de contar con unos ahorros los cuales desea incrementar. En un futuro desea comprase su propia casa e independizarse, así como abrir otra bodega. Este será el préstamo número 02 con la institución MFP, por tanto espera de su colaboración, para continuar con sus objetivos. Además de estar a gusto con banco comunal pues lo considera un grupo responsable. Con el monto solicitado de 800 nuevos soles, lo invertirá en su bodega en la compra de abarrotes a precio por mayor.
texts.en:
Loty, aged 32, is a determined and hard-working woman with a strong desire to get ahead. She is single and comfortably lives in the family house with her father, mother and siblings whom she deeply loves.

Loty sells clothes of various models and all types. The work in this business is a seasonal activity. She sends money to her sister in Lima who buys the clothes requested by Loty's customers.

On the other hand she has a grocery store at home to serve her neighbors and passers-by. During the three years in her grocery she could always rely on her mother to attend the store. She likes her business since it generates an income to pay for her personal needs and help her parents with household expenses. She is also able to regularly save some money.

In the future she wants to buy her own house and become independent, as well as open another store. This is her second loan with the microfinance institution Microfinanzas Prisma and she expects to continue her collaboration with this institution to pursue her goals. She also feels at ease when dealing with her communal bank because in her opinion it is a responsible group. Loty will invest the 800 new soles of her loan in her store and buy groceries at wholesale prices.

loans.use: to buy goods for her grocery.

loans.name: Ana Maria

texts.es:
Ana, es comerciante de ropa, vive acompañada de su esposo y tres hijos, ella se dedica a la venta de ropa de manera ambulante, estas ventas las realiza todos los días  sin un horario fijo.
Ella solicita un préstamo para la compra de camisas, blusas, ropa interior de damas y caballeros, con esta inversión aumentara el inventario de los productos, ayudándole a generar mayores ingresos.
El objetivo de Ana es comprar en un futuro un vehículo para transportar la mercadería, por lo pronto desea continuar en el negocio siendo prospero.
texts.en: Ana is a clothes merchant.  She lives with her husband and three children.  She is an itinerant clothing saleswoman; she sells every day with no fixed work schedule.  She’s asking for a loan to buy shirts, blouses and women’s and men’s underwear to help her earn greater income.  Ana’s objective in future is to buy a vehicle to transport her merchandise.  For the moment, she hopes to continue in a prosperous business.

loans.use: to buy clothes.

loans.name: Noe De Jesus

texts.es:
Noe emprendió el proyecto de montar su propia tienda desde hace 3 meses, después de haber trabajado en Panamá por un tiempo para una compañía del sector eléctrico tendiendo líneas de alumbrado público; sin embargo a sus 61 años considera que esta actividad es muy riesgosa para el, además que empeora el dolor que ya tiene en una de sus articulaciones. Es por esta razón que decidió seguir su sueño de tener una tienda propia en el lugar donde creció y seguir su sueño de tener una tienda propia en el lugar donde creció y estar en permanente contacto con las personas de su barrio. Noe, ahora esta al servicio de sus clientes todos los días, y cada vez les quiere ofrecer una mejor atención. Es por esto que busca un préstamo que le brinde la oportunidad de acceder a realizar mejoras locativas a su local de manera que sea más atractivo y agradable para sus clientes, y comprar surtido para satisfacer las necesidades de sus clientes que no ha podido satisfacer por la falta de surtido.

Noe espera que con esto su negocio aumente en ventas y pueda seguir consiguiendo los ingresos para su hogar donde convive con sus 5 hijos, ya que la madre de sus hijos lo abandonó hace un tiempo. Además, sueña con que su negocio le brinde la oportunidad de generar empleo para personas bien necesitadas que requieran de un salario para sostener sus gastos.
texts.en:
Noe started his project of setting up his own store three months ago after having worked in Panama for a time for an electric power company installing public electrical wiring.  However, at the age of 61 he feels that this type of activity is a bit risky for him and in addition it worsens the pain he has in one of his joints.  Because of this, he decided to follow his dream of having a store of his own where he grew up so that he can be in permanent contact with people from his neighborhood.

Now, Noe is at the public’s service every day and always strives to provide them with better service every time.  Because of this, he’s looking for a loan that will allow him to do some remodeling in his store to make it more attractive and pleasant to his customers and to buy stock merchandise to meet customer needs that he hasn’t been able to for lack of stock.

Noe hopes that with this his business will increase in sales and he will be able to continue to earn income for his home where he lives with his five children since the mother of his children abandoned him some time ago.  In addition, he dreams with the business providing employment opportunities for other people who very much need a salary to cover their expenses.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise and to do some remodeling in his store.

loans.name: Ousmane

texts.fr: L'emprunteur est un homme marié, père de 5 enfants qui sont tous à l'école.Il exerce le métier de carreleur et fait en même temps un commerce de carreaux cassés qui servent à carreler les toilettes des maisons. Ses deux activités lui assurent des revenus assez consistant lui permettant de subvenir à ses propres besoins et à ceux de sa famille. Afin d'augmenter son fonds de commerce, il sollicite un pret de 150000f destinés à l'achat de carreaux cassés. Son ambition est de monter une grande entreprise de bâtiment.
texts.en:
The borrower is a married man, father to 5 children who are all in school. He practices the profession of tiler and at the same time trades in broken tiles which are used to tile bathrooms in homes. His two businesses ensure him a fairly consistent income which allows him to meet his own needs and those of his family. 

In order to expand his business, he is requesting a loan of 150,000f for the purchase of broken tiles. His goal is to create a large building company.

loans.use: to buy broken tiles.

loans.name: Saturnino

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “EL PROGRESO”; este banco se encuentra situado a tres horas de la misma ciudad del Cusco, en el Distrito de Quispicanchis de la Provincia de Ocongate Departamento de Cusco.
El socio Saturnino; El socio tiene 53 años de edad; El socio es casado, El socio se dedica a trabajar en las diferentes obras, el socio es albañil de profesión y el socio realiza trabajos en forma independiente, el socio desea invertir el préstamo en la compra de herramientas como serruchos, martillos, badilejos y otros. El socio solicita el préstamo en la compra de herramientas para mejorar su trabajo.
El socio agradece la oportunidad del préstamo que le permitirá invertir en el negocio y crecer económicamente.
texts.en: The member belongs to the “El Progreso” communal bank located three hours from the city of Cusco in Quispicanchis District in Ocongate Province, Cusco Department.  Saturnino, 53, is married and works at various jobs; he’s a bricklayer by profession and works independently.  He wants to use the loan to buy tools like saws, hammers, trowels and others.  He’s asking for the loan to buy tools to improve his work.  He is grateful for the opportunity of the loan that will allow him to invest in the business and to grow economically.

loans.use: to buy work tools.

loans.name: Luz Marina

texts.es:
Luz es una mujer muy trabajadora, es madre de 2 hijos cuyas edades comprenden entre 19 y 26 años, a los cuales ha sacado adelnate a pesar de las adversidades, vive en la ciudad de chincha, ciudad conocida por su población de origen afroperuano, por sus danzas y es la cuna de grandes glorias del deporte peruano, por sus hermosas playas y por la producción de nuestro producto Bandera el “Pisco”, también esta ciudad es muy conocida por su comida ya que los pobladores de esa ciudad se les conoce por la buena sazón que tienen por ello uno de los platos que más le gusta a Luz es el riquísimo “Arroz con Pato”; en su tiempo líbre le gusta escuchar música y es que eso la tranquiliza cuando está molesta o preocupada.

Con mucho esfuerzo Luz logro tener su negocio de venta de especerías y molidos, el cual consiste en vender los condimentos para sazonar la comida molido, así como las especias molidas, ella se levanta muy temprano para elaborar sus prductos, trabaja alrededor de 9 horas y puede atender hasta 80 clientes diarios, ya que la venta de estos productos ayuda a los clientes a tener los ingredientes listos para añadir a las comidas y cocinar de manera más rápida; ella cree que le va bien en su negocio porque elabora sus productos con mucha limpieza y sobre todo porque vende productos frescos y los clientes sienten más confianza en comprar sus productos.

El agradecimiento que Luz siente hacia los prestatarios Kiva es muy grande ya que con la ayuda que le ha brindado ella podrá comprar más utensilios e insumos para la elaboración de sus productos, con ello ella podrá mejorar sus ingresos y así poder seguir ahorrando para cumplir su más grande sueño: “Darle una profesión a sus hijos”.
texts.en:
Luz is a very hardworking woman; she’s the mother of two children who are 19 and 26 years old that she’s raised despite adversities.  She lives in the city of Chincha, a city known for its Afro-Peruvian population, its dances; because it’s the birthplace of great Peruvian sports heroes, for its beautiful beaches and because of the production of our flagship beverage: “Pisco.” The city is also very well known for its cuisine because residents of this city are known for their tasty preparations.  One of Luz’s favorite dishes is the very delicious “Arroz con Pato” [Rice with Duck].  In her free time she enjoys listening to music which is what calms her down when she’s upset or worried.

With much effort, Luz managed to have a business selling spices and ground spices which consists in selling ground seasoning condiments for food as well as ground spices.  She rises very early to make her products and works about 9 hours and can take care of up to 80 customers daily since sale of these products helps customers have ingredients ready to add to food and cooking is faster.  She believes that she does well in her business because she prepares her products with much cleanliness and above all because she sells fresh products and customers feel confident buying her products.

The gratitude Luz feels towards Kiva lenders in very big because with the help she’s been given she will be able to buy more utensils and ingredients to make her products and with that she can improve her income to continue saving up to reach her greatest dream which is: “To give her children a profession.”

loans.use: to buy utensils and ingredients.

loans.name: Massaér

texts.fr: Massaèr est un homme marié, père d'un enfant.Il exerce depuis 2007 , un commerce de produits vestimentaires et d'articles de mercerie.En l'absence de son père et de sa mère, tous deux décédés, il vit avec son épouse et ses frères qui sont encore très jeunes. Ses revenus lui permettent d'entretenir la famille et de subvenir à ses propres besoins.Afin de faire face à la forte demande, il sollicite un pret de 400 000f pour acheter des articles de mercerie ( lavabos, robinets, etc).Son ambition est d'agrandir sa boutique.
texts.en: Massaèr is a married man, father to one child. Since 2007 he has been trading in clothing products and haberdashery items. In the absence of his father and mother, both deceased, he lives with his spouse and his brothers who are still very young. His income allows him to support his family and to meet his own needs. In order to meet the large demand, he is requesting a loan of 400,000f to buy haberdashery items (washbasins, faucets, etc.). His goal is to expand his shop.

loans.use: to buy haberdashery items (washbasins, faucets, etc.).

loans.name: Henry

texts.en:
Henry, age 57, owns and operates a shop that sells canned goods, snacks, spices, and beverages. He has run this business for 15 years. He has requested a loan in the amount of PhP 7,000 to buy canned goods, snacks, spices, and beverages to offer for sale. 

He is married with 4 children.

Henry has been a member of HSPFI since 2011.  In the future, Henry hopes to improve his business.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks, spices, and beverages to offer for sale

loans.name: Jessie

texts.en:
Jessie, age 38, has a clothing shop where she sells such items as shirts, blouses, and gowns. She has had this business for 10 years. She has requested a loan for PhP 5,000 in order to buy t-shirts, blouses, and gowns to offer for sale. 

She is married with 6 children.

Jessie has been a member of HSPFI since 2011. In the future, Jessie hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy clothing items like t-shirts, blouses, and gowns to offer for sale

loans.name: Fanny Leonor

texts.es:
La Señora Fanny es socia del banco comunal El Reencuentro, vive por un sector de la parroquia de Baños en Cuenca,  Baños se sitúa al pie de la Cordillera Occidental, en un sitio de irregular relieve. Esta parroquia moviliza grandes cantidades de gente, atraídos por las bondades de sus aguas termales, la majestuosidad de su templo y la fiesta de la Virgen de Guadalupe. Su gente es amable y gentil, mantienen la cultura y tradiciones de sus pueblos, dedicándose al comercio, cría de animales y a la agricultura.

La Señora. Fanny tiene 54 años, es casada y en su unión conyugal ha concebido 3 hijos quienes son mayores de edad, son casados y viven independientes. Su esposo se dedica a la venta de madera y también es sastre.
 
Doña Fanny labora conjuntamente con su esposo en la sastrería, actividad en la que es una profesional, se encuentra en el negocio desde que se caso, como labora en casa también se dedica a la cría de cerdos, pollos y cuyes.

Es socia del banco comunal hace 4 años y su nuevo crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de tela, hilo y también en alimento para sus animales.
 
Su meta es poner una tienda en su casa.
texts.en:
Fanny is a member of the El Reencuentro Communal Bank.  She lives in an area of the parish of Baños in Cuenca.  Baños is located at the foot of the western range of the Andes, a site of irregular relief.  A lot of people move through this parish attracted by the benefits of its hot springs, the majesty of its temple, and the festival of the Virgin of Guadalupe.  Its people are pleasant and kind and they maintain the traditions of their people.  They work in commerce, animal rearing, and agriculture.

Fanny is 54 years old, married, and has three children.  Her children are adults who are married and live on their own.  Her husband sells wood for a living and he's also a tailor.

Fanny works together with her husband in their tailoring business, in which she is a professional.  She has been in this business since she married and, as she works at home, she also raises pigs, chickens, and guinea pigs.

She has been a member of the communal bank for four years now and she is going to invest her loan in the purchase of fabric, thread, and also in feed for her animals.

Her goal is to set up a shop in her home.

loans.use: to buy fabric, thread, and feed for her animals

loans.name: Norma

texts.es: Norma, de 54 años es una mujer emprendedora y muy dinámica, esta casada hace mucho tiempo con Sixto quien es padre de sus cinco hijos de los cuales tres ya son mayores e independientes y solo dos menores que aun viven y dependen de ellos, Norma de 15 y Génesis de 12. Juntos viven en su casa propia en donde a diario comparten la alegría de ser una familia unida y trabajar todos para poder mejorar su condicion de vida. Cuando en la cuadra de su casa algún vecino, amigo o familiar necesita comprar alguna prenda de vestir a buen precio, buen diseño y sobre todo muy a la moda, acuden a casa de Norma, ya que ahí encuentran los mejores diseños y de las mejores marcas. Norma tiene que trabajar de la manera que mas le convenga al cliente ya sea a crédito y cobrándolos semanal o quincenal o al contado. Por otro lado, se dedica a la chacra a sembrar, ahí aprovecha también en llevar su mercadeería a sus amigos. Lleva realizando este trabajo por 10 años y le esta yendo muy bien ya que tiene muchos clientes y casi nunca le sobran prendas al momento de ofrecer, ahora espera seguir creciendo para mas adelante desea montar un local de venta de prendas de vestir y no tener que salir a ofrecer por lugares alejados. Este será el crédito número 15 con MFP, esta muy contenta de saber que tendrá un respaldo financiero ya que le dará la garantía de seguir trabajando tranquila, ella por su parte esta comprometida en seguir siendo una socia puntual en sus cuotas así como fue en anteriores créditos que tuvo. Con el monto solicitado 2000 soles, comprará más mercadería ya que desea tener siempre a la moda a sus clientes y ofrecerles variedad de prendas.
texts.en:
Norma, 54, is an enterprising, very dynamic woman.  She’s been married to Sixto for a long time.  He’s the father of their five children three of which are now independent adults and only two minors still live with them and depend on them: Norma, 15 and Génesis, 12.  They live together in their own house where they daily share the joy of being a unified family and all work together to improve their living conditions.

Whenever someone on her block, neighbor or family member needs to buy a well-designed, stylish article of clothing at a good price they come to Norma’s house because they will find there the best designs and the best brands.  Norma has to work in whatever way is most convenient for her customers be that credit collecting weekly or biweekly payments or cash.  On the other hand, she also farms her plot taking her products to her friends.  She’s been in business ten years and is doing very well because she has many customers and she hardly ever has any articles of clothing left over to sell.  Now she hopes to continue growing so that later on she can set up a clothing store and no longer have to go out to faraway places to sell.

This will be MFP loan #15.  She is very happy to know that she can count on financial support because that will provide her with a guarantee to continue working in peace.  On her part, she’s committed to continue being a punctual member with her installment payments like she’s been with her previous loans.  She will use the requested 2000 soles to buy merchandise because she always wants her customers to be up to date with styles and to offer a variety of clothes.

loans.use: to buy more clothes.

loans.name: Mercilyn

She also runs a retail business where she sells a variety of products. She has requested a loan in the amount of PhP 5,000 in order to buy raw ingredients for making her viands as well as to replenish the inventory in the retail store. 

She is married with two children.

Mercilyn has a new member of HSPFI . In the future, Mercilyn hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy raw ingredients for making her viands as well as to replenish the inventory in the retail

After serving 10 years in the teaching profession, James has requested this loan in order to pay college fees to pursue further studies.

Sabeniano is a new member of HSPFI. In the future, Sabeniano hopes to improve his services.

loans.name: Marta

texts.es: Marta de 36 años de edad vive en una urbanización muy cerca al mar con su cónyuge y sus tres hijos en las edades de 16 años. Ella comercializa queso, carnes frías y también productos mediante guías especializadas, como perfumes y cosméticos a crédito. Sus ventas las realiza a una clientela selecta, para la cual busca los mejores precios, con tal de mantenerla fiel. Su idea de negocio inició hace 3 años; 15 años después de  haber llegado desde Sincé en el departamento de Sucre a trabajar en la prestación de servicios en oficios varios en la ciudad de Barranquilla. Con un  préstamo que le hizo su madre, para que trabajara independiente, comenzó a vender queso, carnes frías mediante el sistema de reparto entre sus amigas, familiares y vecinas; así fue como sus ingresos empezaron a incrementarse y logró adicionar otros productos que sus clientes requerían. Marta tiene su casa propia, es una mujer muy trabajadora, ocasionalmente presta servicios de oficios varios en empresas por horas,  su cónyuge presta el servicio de domicilios en motocicleta y ambos apoyan el desempeño de su hogar. En la actualidad está aplicando a su primer credikiva, también primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, con el que comprará paquetes de carnes, queso por kilos, y productos por catálogos que vienen con descuentos especiales y que responderán a los pedidos de sus clientes.  En su negocio Marta maneja una rotación de cuentas por cobrar de 4 días, rentabilidad sobre las ventas no menor del  36,7%, indicadores financieros desde los cuales se proyecta el crecimiento de su negocio.
texts.en:
Marta is 36 years old. She lives in a residential area very close to the sea with her husband and her three children who range from 16 years. She sells cheese, cold meats and also products through specialized catalogs, such as perfumes and cosmetics, on credit. Her sales are made with select customers, for whom she looks for the best prices, for the sake of keeping them faithful.

Her business idea began 3 years ago, 15 years after having arrived from Sincé in the department of Sucre to work providing services in various offices in the city of Barranquilla. With a loan that she made through her mother, in order to work independently, she began to sell cheese and cold meats through the distribution system among her friends, relatives and neighbors, and so it was that her income began to increase and she was able to add other products that her customers needed. 

Marta has her own house. She is very hard working working, and occasionally she does various jobs for businesses at an hourly wage. Her husband services motorcycles from home and both manage the household. 

Currently she is asking for her first Kiva loan, and also her first financing through Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, with which she will buy packages of meat, cheese by the kilo, and products through catalogs that come with special discounts so she can fulfill the requests of her customers. In her business Marta manages a circulating accounts receivable of 4 days, profitability on sales of not less than 36.7%, which are financial indicators for the projected growth of her business.

loans.use: to buy packages of meat, cheese by the kilo, and products through catalogs that come with special discounts

loans.name: Margoth

texts.es: Ibis, de 26 años, es una mujer emprendedora y luchadora, es conviviente con Denis de 26 años, con quien tiene dos hijos de 6 y 4 años. Juntos viven en casa de los padres de su pareja con quien trabaja mucho para así poder brindar una mejor calidad de vida a su familia. Todos los días Ibis se dirige a su refrigerador en donde están los productos que ofrece a sus clientes, realiza su inventario y hace la lista de las bebidas que le hacen falta y se dirige al mercado a comprarlos. Es así que Ibis vende bebidas de diferentes sabores y marcas, por lo que ya lleva más 5 años realizando éste trabajo. Ella es muy responsable con su negocio y con la sociedad es así que las bebidas gaseosas los vende a todo publico pero las cervezas solo a mayores de edad según lo permitido en nuestra cuidad. Espera seguir manteniendo su negocio y esperar el momento preciso para poder empezar expandirlo. Este será el crédito número 4 con MFP, por tanto espera de su colaboración para continuar con sus objetivos, por otro lado se compromete en seguir siendo una socia puntual y cumplida como en los créditos anteriores que tuvo, además desea seguir trabajando con los socios de su banco comunal ya que todos son muy amables y solidarios. Con el monto solicitado 2200 soles, comprará bebidas para tener en stock ya que por el incremento de la temperatura en la zona cada día aumentan mas sus ventas.
texts.en:
Ibis, 26, is an enterprising, tenacious woman living with Denis, 26, and their two children who are 6 and 4 years old.  They live together in her spouse’s parents’ house.  They work together very hard to provide a better quality of life for their family.

Ibis heads to her refrigerator every day which is where she stores the products she sells to her customers.  She takes inventory and lists the beverages she needs and heads out to the market to purchase them.  This is how Ibis sells a variety of brands and flavors of beverages, a business she’s been in for over five years.  She is very responsible with her business and with society so she sells soft-drinks to everyone but beer only to adults according to what’s permitted in our city.  She hopes to continue in business and waiting for the right moment to start to expand it.

This will be MFP loan #4 so she’s hoping for your collaboration to continue towards her goals.  She commits once again to be punctual and responsible with her payments like she’s been with previous loans.  She wants to continue working with her communal bank because all the members are kind and supportive.  She will use the requested 2200 soles to buy beverages to have in stock since the rising temperatures in the zone increase sales daily.

loans.use: to buy more beverages like soft-drinks and beer.

loans.name: Jeffrey

texts.en:
Jeffrey, age 35, has a pig pen where he raises pigs. He sells the matured pigs at market. He has had this business for five years. Jeffrey is married and has three children.

Jeffrey has requested a loan in the amount of PhP 5,000 in order to buy animal feed for his pigs. He is a member of HSPFI and hopes eventually to improve his business.

loans.use: to buy animal feed for his pigs

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: buy work tools like chisels, hammers and lights, among other things, and this way perform higher quality work.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a minivan for his business.

loans.name: Rosalie

texts.en:

Rosalie is buying and selling gasoline per liter along the highway. She has had this business for 10 years. She requested a loan for PHP 5,000 to buy stock of gasoline to sell.

Rosalie is a new member of HSPFI.  In the future, Rosalie hopes to improve her business.

loans.name: Mercedes Maria

texts.es:
La Señora Mercedes es socia del banco comunal El Aguacate, vive por un hermoso sector de la ciudad de Cuenca, esta ciudad  es conocida como la Santa Ana de los 4 Ríos, desde Diciembre de 1999 es Patrimonio Cultural de la Humanidad, cuenta con una gran riqueza natural y cultural, su gente mantiene la cultura y tradiciones de sus pueblos.

La Señora. Mercedes tiene 64 años, es viuda pero en su unión conyugal ha concebido 5 hijos quienes son mayores de edad, cuatro de ellos son casados y viven independientes, su hijo soltero trabaja y le ayuda  económicamente. La casa en la que vive es de su propiedad.

Doña Mercedes tiene una tienda de comestibles hace 10 años, trabaja en ella de domingo a domingo sin un horario fijo. También cría aves de corral y cuyes.
 
Se encuentra en el quinto crédito que realiza en el banco comunal y lo va a invertir en la compra de productos de primera necesidad para su tienda y cerdos para la cría.
 
Su meta es agrandar su tienda.
texts.en:
Mercedes is a member of the “El Aguacate” (Avocado) communal bank.  She lives in a beautiful part of Cuenca, a city known as “Santa Ana de los 4 Ríos” [Santa Ana of the Four Rivers].  Since December, 1999, it’s been a Cultural Patrimony of Humanity.  It has great natural and cultural riches and its residents maintain the culture and traditions of its peoples.

Mercedes is 64 years old and a widow but she had five children who are all now adults.  Four of them are married and live independently and her single son works and helps her economically.  The house she lives in is her property.

Mercedes has had a grocery store for ten years.  She works there Sunday to Sunday with no fixed work schedule.  She also raises barnyard fowl and guinea pigs.

She’s in her fifth loan with the communal bank and will use it to buy stock staple items for the store and to buy pigs to raise.  Her goal is to enlarge her store.

loans.use: to buy basic staple items and to buy pigs.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to renovate her salon.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to change her shop’s interior design.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to enlarge his shop and buy a new espresso machine.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase new plumbing tools.

loans.name: Ana

texts.es: Ana, de 48 años es una mujer amable y muy emprendedora, es madre de tres hijos de 24 años Juan Carlos, Milton de 22 y Ana de 19, lamentablemente su esposo la abandono con sus tres hijos cuando estos aún eran menores así que tuvo que trabajar el doble para poder brindarle una buena calidad de vida. El trabajo de Ana consiste en la venta de ropa de segunda, durante cierto periodo de tiempo ella se dirige a los diferentes caseríos, pueblos y comunidades que se encuentran a la orilla del río Ucayali en donde ofrece sus prendas de vestir a cambio de dinero o en algunos casos de productos granos o animales. Lleva realizando este trabajo por 15 años y le sirvió de mucho pues gracias a esta actividad pudo dar educación y alimento a sus hijos quienes ahora son mayores y aportan en la economía de su hogar. Siente que le esta yendo bien ya que como durante todo este tiempo fue conociendo mucha gente y varias comunidades, ya sabe a donde dirigirse cada vez que sale y ahí tiene clientes que la esperan con ansias para comprarle las prendas que lleva. Espera seguir trabajando para ver progresar su negocio y mas adelante empezar a vender prendas nuevas. Este será el primer préstamo con MFP, esta muy contenta por que le brindaran un respaldo financiero y así podrá aumentar su capital de trabajo, sabe que tendrá que ser muy responsable y sobre todo muy puntual. Con el monto solicitado 800 soles, comprará fardos de prendas de vestir de segunda y así ir nuevamente por los caseríos a seguir vendiendo sus prendas.
texts.en:
Ana, 48, is a kind, very enterprising woman.  She’s the mother of three children: Juan Carlos, 24, Milton, 22 and Ana, 19.  Sadly, her husband abandoned her with three children when they were still minors so she had to work twice as hard to provide them with a good quality of life.

Ana’s work consists in selling second-hand clothes.  During a certain amount of time she heads to the various settlements, towns and communities along the Ucayali River to sell clothes in exchange for money and on some occasions for grains or animals.  She’s been in this business for 15 years and it’s been very useful for her in that she was able to provide education and food for her children who are now adults and contribute to the home’s economy.  She feels that she’s doing well because since she’s gotten to know many people and several communities throughout the years she knows just where to go every time she goes out and she has customers who anxiously await her to buy the clothes she brings.  She hopes to continue working to see her business progress even more and later on start to sell new clothes.

This will be her first MFP loan.  She’s very happy to have financial support that will allow her to increase her working capital.  She knows that she’ll have to be very responsible and above all very punctual.  She will use the requested amount of 800 soles to buy bundles of second-hand clothes to once again head out to the hamlets and continue selling her articles of clothing.

loans.use: to buy more second-hand clothes.

loans.name: Cecilia

texts.en:
Cecilia, age 51, runs an eatery shop or food shop where she sells chicken and pork barbecue meals and grilled hotdogs. She has had this business for 22 years. She and her husband have seven children.

She has requested a loan in the amount of PhP 25,000 in order to buy the raw ingredients for making barbecue and grilled hotdogs. 

Cecilia has been a member of HSPFI since 2009. In the future, Cecilia hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy the raw ingredients for making barbecue and grilled hotdogs to offer for sale

She has requested a loan in the amount of PhP 5,000 to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks, and beverages to offer for sale. 

Melanie has been a member of HSPFI since 2010. In the future, Melanie hopes to improve her business.

loans.name: Luis Manuel Mesias

texts.es:
Luis Manuel Mesias tiene 30 años, es casado vive  con la esposa y con los hijos en  el Cantón Chillanes Provincia de Bolívar. Tiene 3 hijos.

La ventanilla TRABAJADORES AGRICOLAS se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Matilde Esther perteneciente al cantón Chillanes, esta ventanilla son 11 socios y se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembre de maíz, cacao, naranja y plátano ya en esta zona es humedad y se dan estos productos, además se dedican a la crianza de animales de corral.

Luis se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de cacao, café y naranja. Compra sus productos en  Mata de Cacao cada fin de mes y los vende en la feria de los domingos en Chillanes.

El crédito solicito para la compra de abono, urea, líquidos  fertilizantes para la siembra del maíz y cacao. El préstamo le ayudado para aumentar los ingresos para el consumo de la familia y para invertir. Su sueño es que la cosecha sea bueno para tener mayores ingresos.

en los tiempos libres disfruta mucho haciendo deporte, y el festejar el carnaval.
texts.en:
Luis Manuel Mesias is 30 and lives with his wife and 3 children in Chillanes canton, Bolívar province.

The small communal bank “Trabajadores Agricolas,” or “Agricultural Workers,” is located in the Matilde Esther precinct, Chillanes canton. This communal bank has 11 members who grow short-cycle crops including corn, cocoa bean, oranges, and plantains since these are the crops that grow in this humid climate. In addition, the members also raise farm animals.

Luis plants cacao bean, coffee, and oranges. He purchases his products in Mata de Cacao and sells in Chillanes at the Sunday market at the end of every month. 

The loan requested is to purchase fertilizer, urea [a kind of fertilizer with nitrogen], and liquid fertilizers for planting corn and cacao bean. The loan has helped him increase his earnings for the family’s consumption and for investing. His dream is to have a good harvest so he can earn a better income. 

In his free time, he enjoys playing sports and celebrating Carnaval.

loans.use: purchase fertilizer, urea [a type of fertilizer with nitrogen], and liquid fertilizers

loans.name: Digna Fidela

texts.es:
DIGNA FIDELA TIENE 38 años de edad es casada tiene tres hijos,  vive con el esposo y con los hijos en el Cantón Ventanas provincia de los ríos
	
Es integrante de la VRC 27 DE OCTUBR, se encuentra ubicada en el recinto Santa Sofía, Perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas, Esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz, arroz, frejol gandul.
Digna se dedica a la agricultura a la siembre de maíz y arroz

Digna se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz y arroz, las compras y las ventas lo hace en Ventanas.
 
Solicita el crédito para poder comprar abonos, fertilizantes, urea, líquidos para la maleza, Con la ayuda del crédito podrá comprar insumos para los cultivos sin ninguna dificultad. Enfrenta desafíos como las plagas el raton y la langosta en los sembríos.

El sueño es poder comprar un terreno para poder sembrar y hacer una casa.  En el tiempo libre le gusta realizar los quehaceres domésticos.
texts.en:
Digna Fidela, 38, is married and has three children; she lives with her husband and children in Ventanas Canton, Los Ríos Province.

She’s a member of the “27 de Octubre” communal bank located in Recinto Santa Sofía belonging to Ventanas Canton.  This communal bank is dedicated to short cycle corn, rice and pigeon pea farming.  Digna farms corn and rice.  Her purchases and her sales take place in Ventanas.

She requests the loan to buy manure, fertilizer, urea and weed killers.  With help from the loan she will be able to buy supplies for her crops problem-free.  She faces challenges like “ratón” and “langosta” [crop pests] in her crops.  Her dream is to be able to buy a piece of land on which to plant and build her house.  In her free time she enjoys doing household chores.

loans.use: to buy manure, fertilizer, urea and weed killers.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy additional painting tools.

loans.name: Geraldine

texts.en:
Geraldine, age 28, operates a retail shop where she buys and sells canned goods, snacks, and beverages. She has had this business for six years. She and her husband have two children.

She has requested a loan for 5,000 to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks, and beverages to offer for sale. 

Geraldine has been a member of HSPFI since 2011. In the future,Geraldine hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks, and beverages to offer for sale

loans.name: Martha Braulia

texts.es:
La Señora. Martha es socia del banco comunal El Aguacate, vive por un hermoso sector de la ciudad de Cuenca, esta  ciudad es conocida como la Santa Ana de los 4 Ríos, desde Diciembre de 1999 es Patrimonio Cultural de la Humanidad, cuenta con una gran riqueza natural y cultural, su gente mantiene la cultura y tradiciones de sus pueblos.

Doña Martha tiene 34 años, es casada y en su unión conyugal ha concebido dos hijos  de 9 y 3 años de edad, su primera hija está estudiando en una escuelita de la ciudad. Su esposo labora en su propio taller ya que es diseñador de joyas, la casa en la que viven es propia. 

La Señora. Martha labora conjuntamente con su esposo en el diseño de joyas, actividad que la desempeña hace 10 años, también labora en un taller en su casa donde se dedica a la confección y arreglo de ropa deportiva y de niños, actividad que la aprendió trabajando hace 7 años.
 
Se encuentra en el quinto crédito que realiza en el banco comunal y lo va a invertir en la compra de materia prima como: oro, plata, piedras finas, telas, hilos, botones, etc.  tanto para el taller de su esposo como para su taller. 

Su meta es agrandar su taller de costura y tener operarios.
texts.en:
Martha is a member of the “El Aguacate” (Avocado) communal bank.  She lives in a beautiful part of the city of Cuenca, a city known as “Santa Ana de los 4 Ríos” [Santa Ana of the Four Rivers].  Since December, 1999, it’s been a Cultural Heritage of Humanity.  It has great natural and cultural riches and its residents maintain the culture and tradition of its peoples.

Martha is 34 years old, married and has two children who are 9 and 3 years of age.  Her oldest daughter attends a little elementary school in the city.  Her husband works in his own shop because he’s a jewelry designer.  The house they live in his their own.

Martha works with her husband designing jewelry, an activity she’s been doing for ten years.  She also works at a sewing workshop at home where she makes and repairs athletic wear and children’s clothes, an activity she learned working seven years ago.

She’s in her fifth loan with the communal bank and will use it to buy raw materials like gold, silver, fine gem stones, fabric, thread, buttons, etc. both for her husband’s and her own workshop.  Her goal is to enlarge her sewing workshop and to hire workers.

loans.use: to buy gold, silver, fine gem stones, fabric, thread, buttons, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase new painting tools and develop his business.

loans.name: Ricardo

Ricardo is a new member of HSPFI. In the future, Ricardo hopes to improve his services.

Preciosa Antonia is a new member of HSPFI.  In the future, she hopes to improve her business.

Aretas has been a member of HSPFI since 2011.  In the future, she hopes to improve her business.

loans.name: Jerom

texts.en:
Jerom is 32 years old and lives in the Philippines. He is married and has one child.

Jerom provides motorela or motorcycle services. He has had this business for five years. He requested a loan of PHP 5,000 to buy tools and pay for gasoline for his motorcycle services.

Jerom is a new member of HSPFI.  In the future, he hopes to improve his services.

loans.use: to buy tools and pay for gasoline for his motorcycle service.

loans.name: Gemma

texts.en:
Gemma is 42 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with two children.
 
Gemma has a food shop that sells viands like chicken and pork adobo (chicken or pork marinated in a sauce of vinegar and garlic), pancit guisado (fried noodles with mixed meats), and lomi (thick egg noodles). She also runs her retail store. She has had this business for 19 years. She requested a loan for PHP 11,000 to buy raw ingredients for making viands and stock for the retail store.

Gemma has been a member of HSPFI since 2011. In the future, Gemma hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy raw ingredients for making viands and stock for the retail store

loans.name: Evangeline

texts.en:
Evangeline is 49 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married and has four children.

Evangeline has a shop that sells green bananas by the kilogram. She has had this business for five years. She requested a loan of PHP 5,000 to buy green bananas to resell.

Evangeline is a new member of HSPFI.  In the future, she hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy green bananas for resale.

loans.name: Victorina

texts.en:
Victorina is 51 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with five children. 

Victorina has a food shop, or "carinderia," that sells viands like pork adobo (pork marinated in a sauce of vinegar and garlic) and pancit guisado (fried noodles with mixed meats). She has had this business for two years. She requested a loan for PHP 9,000 to buy raw ingredients for making viands to sell.

Victorina has been a member of HSPFI since 2011. In the future, Victorina hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy raw ingredients for making viands to sell

loans.name: Editha

texts.en:
Editha is 39 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with five children. 

Editha has a food shop that sells snacks like banana-cue (deep fried bananas coated in caramelized brown sugar) and banana cakes. She has had this business for five years. She requested a loan for PHP 7,000 to buy bananas for making snacks like banana-cue.

Editha has been a member of HSPFI since 2011. In the future, Editha hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy bananas for making snacks like banana-cue

loans.name: Josephine

texts.en:
Josephine, age 37, has a food shop or "carenderia." Here, she prepares and sells traditional viands like pancit guisado and snacks like banana-cue and pancakes. She has had this business for two years. She is unmarried and has one child.

She has requested a loan in the amount of PhP 4,000 in order to buy the raw ingredients needed for preparing viands and snacks to offer for sale.

Josephine has been a member of HSPFI since 2011. In the future, Josephine hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy the raw ingredients needed for preparing traditional viands and snacks to offer for sale

loans.name: Fe

texts.en: Fe is 35 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with three children. Fe has a retail shop that buys and sells canned goods, snacks and beverages. She has had this business for two years. She requested a loan for PHP4,000 to buy raw ingredients for making viands & stocks for her retail store. Fe has been a member of HSPFI since 2011.  In the future, Fe hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy raw ingredients for making viands and stocks for her retail store.

loans.name: Esther

texts.en:
Esther, age 39, lives in Paynesville, Liberia. She has a business where she offers oil, vita, and pepper for sale. She and her husband have two children, one of whom still lives at home and attends school. Her husband has his own business.

Esther has had her business for four years now. She was taught how to run the business by her mother. Her main challenge is the increase in prices for the things she sells.  

She is requesting a loan in order to purchase more vita, oil, and pepper to offer for sale through her business. Her goal is someday to build a house for her family.

loans.use: to purchase more vita, oil, and pepper to offer for sale

loans.name: Rasha

texts.en: Rasha is a conservative woman, so her husband Ashraf is pictured in the photograph instead. Rasha is a 27-year-old woman. She is married with two sons and one daughter. Rasha's husband is employed, but his salary is not enough to cover all the family's needs and expenses. Rasha is requesting a youth loan from FATEN to help her cover the expense of adding another room to their house and improving the family's home condition. This will increase the size of the house and offer the family better living conditions.

loans.use: To pay the expense of adding another room to her house.

loans.name: Ammar

texts.en: Ammar is a 24-year-old young man. He is employed but his salary is not enough to cover all his wedding expenses. Ammar is preparing to be married soon, and he is requesting a $1,000 USD youth loan from FATEN to help him cover the costs of purchasing new bedroom furniture to get his house ready for this occasion. This will make Ammar well prepared for the event and provide better living conditions for him and his wife. Ammar is pictured in the photograph.

loans.use: To pay part of his wedding expenses.

loans.name: Felix Alfredo

texts.es:
FELIX ALFREDO tiene 35 años de edad es casado tiene dos hijos, vive con la esposa y los hijos en el Cantón Ventanas provincia de los ríos.

Es integranbte de la VRC 27 DE OCTUBR, se encuentra ubicada en el recinto Santa Sofía, Perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas, Esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz, arroz, frejol gandul.

Felix se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, las compras y las ventas lo hace en Ventanas.

Solicita el crédito para comprar abonos, líquidos, ure y fertilizantes para el maíz. Con el apoyo del crédito podrá comprar los productos sin ningún problema y sin falta de dinero. Los desafíos a los que se enfrenta son las plagas la langoista en los cultivos.

El sueño es poder comprar terreno para cultivar cacao y comprarse una casa. En el tiempo libre le gusta practicar el deporte .
texts.en:
Felix Alfredo is 35 years old, married, and has two children.  He lives with his wife and children in the canton of Ventanas in Los Ríos Province.

Felix is a member of the October 27th Communal Bank, which is located in the neighborhood of Santa Sofía in the canton of Ventanas.  This Communal Bank consists of short cycle farmers who grow corn, rice, and pigeon peas.  

Felix is a farmer who grows corn.  He buys and sells in Ventanas.  Felix is requesting a loan to buy compost, liquid nutrients, urea, and fertilizers for his corn crop.  With the support of this loan, he will be able to buy these products without problems since he currently lacks the money.  His challenges include dealing with “langosta”, a pest that could ruin the corn.  

His dreams are to buy land for growing cacao and to purchase a house.  In his free time, Felix enjoys practicing sports.

loans.use: to buy compost, liquid nutrients, urea, and fertilizers for his corn crop.

loans.name: Galo Evaristo

texts.es:
Galo Evaristo tiene 43 años de edad es soltero no tiene hijos, vive con los padres en el cantón Ventanas provincia de los Ríos.

Es integranbte de la VRC 27 DE OCTUBR, se encuentra ubicada en el recinto Santa Sofía, Perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas, Esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz, arroz, frejol gandul.

Galo se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz. Las compras y las ventas lo hace en ventanas.

Solicita el crédito para comprar semillas, fertilizantes, urea y poder arrendar más terreno para sembrar. Con la ayuda del crédito podrá comprar los insumos agrícolas para que la siembra sea un exito. Los desafíos a los que se enfrenta son las plagas coma la langosta.

El sueño es poder comprarse un terreno. En el tiempo libre le gusta jugar boli.
texts.en:
Galo Evaristo is 43 years old, single, and has no children.  He lives with his parents in the canton of Ventanas in Los Ríos Province.

Galo is a member of the October 27th Communal Bank, which is located in the neighborhood of Santa Sofía in the canton of Ventanas.  This Communal Bank consists of short cycle farmers who grow corn, rice, and pigeon peas.  

Galo is a farmer who grows corn.  He buys and sells in Ventanas.  Galo is requesting a loan to buy seeds, fertilizers, and urea so that he can prepare more land for planting.  With the support of this loan, he will be able to buy farming supplies so that he can have a successful planting.  His challenges include dealing with pests known as “langosta”.  

His dream is to buy a piece of land.  In his free time, Galo enjoys playing volleyball.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizers, and urea.

loans.name: Khat

texts.en:
Mrs. Khat, age 26, is a humble villager living in the Ornlong Veng district of Siem Reap province. She has been blessed with one child who is under her care. She helps her husband in earning an income by growing vegetable crops in the province. She generates approximately $ 2.00 per day. 

Mrs. Khat plans to rebuild her house again because it is a very old house in need of significant and essential repairs. She is therefore taking out a loan from HKL in the sum of $700, which will complement her savings to provide enough funds to repair and reconstruct her house. 

Next month, Mrs. Khat would like to grow potato crops on her existing farmland in order to make extra income. She hopes that she will be able to ensure a bright future for her child and to provide him with an ongoing education.

loans.use: to complement her savings to provide enough funds to repair and reconstruct her house

loans.name: Andrew

texts.en:
Andrew is a resident of Changamwe, Kenya. He is involved in the transport industry, a business he has run for fifteen years. He is the married father of four school-going children. 

Andrew is applying for a loan of 80,000 Kenya shillings to refurbish his taxis. The challenges facing the business are the high cost of fuel and the travel advisories that affect tourist visits to the country.

His future ambition is to start a tours-and-safaris business offering tour-guide ticketing and hotel bookings. Andrew believes the additional income from this loan will help pay for his children’s school fees and allow his family to access better health care.

loans.use: to refurbish his taxis

loans.name: Jeniffer

texts.en:
Jeniffer is a widow with a fish sales business at the Kongowea market. She was introduced to Milango by her friends and is applying for a loan of 60,000 Kenya shillings in order to purchase fish to offer for sale.

Jeniffer’s main challenge is the competition from other fishmongers. Her goal is to eventually supply fish in bulk.

loans.use: to purchase fish to offer for sale

loans.name: Batbayar

texts.en:
Batbayar, 44, sells coal in the street for use as fuel.  She lives in the ger (a Mongolian traditional nomadic tent) district, with her family.  

Batbayar has been running her business since 2010, and has many permanent customers. She is taking a loan to purchase a motorcycle for her business. She will use it to carry her coal bags between her home and workplace, because her coal stall is located a little bit of a distance from her home. Just one bag weighs about 25-30 kilograms and this is a heavy weight for her to carry. As she said, if she could buy a motorcycle, her business would be easier to run and more efficient.

loans.use: to cover the cost of purchasing a new motorcycle for her business.

loans.name: Nimfa

texts.en:
Nimfa is 54 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married and has four children.

Nimfa has a retail shop that buys and sells canned goods, snacks, and beverages. She has had this business for two years. She requested a loan of PHP 5,000 to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks, and beverages to resell.

Nimfa is a new member of HSPFI.  In the future, she hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks, and beverages to resell.

loans.name: Heli

texts.es:
Heli, vive con su familia, su esposa y tres hijos, solamente él trabaja en el hogar, se dedica a trabajar con  un taller de enderezado y pintura, lo comenzó por iniciativa propia, lo tiene instalado en su propia casa, no tiene un horario establecido, pues depende de la demanda de los clientes.
Él está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de materiales para el taller como hierro, pinturas, masillas, con estos materiales  ayudara para mejorar el negocio, permitiéndole a él elaborar los trabajos de los clientes de la mejor manera.
Su objetivo es buscar la mejoría para el negocio, atender a la clientela mejor, con un buen trabajo, ya que esto le generara mayor seguridad para obtener ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
Heli lives with his family, composed of his wife and three children. He is the only one of the family to have a job. He operates an automobile paint and body shop, that he has started out of his own initiative, located in his own house. He does not work fixed hours as his schedule depends on his customers’ requests.
He is requesting a loan to buy supplies for his workshop such as iron, paints and putty, materials that will help him improve his activity by allowing him to create what his customers request in the best way possible.
His goal is to find ways to improve his activity, to tend to his customers in the best way possible and to offer them a good product, thus assuring himself a better income to support his family.

loans.use: To buy iron, paints and putty.

loans.name: Carlos Raul

texts.es:
Carlos Raul tiene 35 años de edad  es casado tiene dos hijos, vive con la  es posa y con los hijos en el cantón Ventanas provincia de los Ríos.

Es integranbte de la VRC 27 DE OCTUBR, se encuentra ubicada en el recinto Santa Sofía, Perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas, Esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz, arroz, frejol gandul.

Carlos se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz. Las compras y las ventas lo hace en ventanas.

Solicita el crédito para comprar semillas, fertilizantes, urea y poder arrendar más terreno para sembrar. Con la ayuda del crédito podrá comprar los insumos agrícolas para que la siembra sea un exito. Los desafíos a los que se enfrenta son las plagas coma la langosta.

El sueño es poder comprarse un terreno. En el tiempo libre le gusta jugar boli.
texts.en:
Carlos Raul is 35 years old, married, and has two children.  He lives with his wife and children in the canton of Ventanas in Los Ríos Province.

Carlos is a member of the October 27th Communal Bank, which is located in the neighborhood of Santa Sofía in the canton of Ventanas.  This Communal Bank consists of short cycle farmers who grow corn, rice, and pigeon peas.  

Carlos is a farmer who grows corn.  He buys and sells in Ventanas.  Carlos is requesting a loan to buy seeds, fertilizers, and urea so that he can prepare more land for planting.  With the support of this loan, he will be able to buy farming supplies so that he can have a successful planting.  His challenges include dealing with pests known as “langosta”.  

His dream is to buy a piece of land.  In his free time, Carlos enjoys playing volleyball.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizers, and urea.

loans.name: Victor Julio

texts.es:
VICTOR JULIO tiene 24 años de edad de  casado tine un hijo, vive con la esposa y con el hijo de 4 años de edad en Ventanas provincia de los ríos.

Es integranbte de la VRC 27 DE OCTUBR, se encuentra ubicada en el recinto Santa Sofía, Perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas, Esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz, arroz, frejol gandul.

Victor se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, Las compras y las ventas lo hace en Ventanas. Los desafíos a los que se enfrenta son las plagas como la langosta y el raton.

Solicita el crédito para comprar insumos, urea, abonos, líquidos para la maleza. con la ayuda del crédito podrá mejorar el nivel de vida para poder trabajar.

El sueño es poder comprar una casa. En el tiempo libre le gusta practicar el deporte.
texts.en:
Victor Julio is 24 years old, married, and has one child.  He lives with his wife and four-year-old son in the canton of Ventanas in Los Ríos Province.

Victor is a member of the October 27th Communal Bank, which is located in the neighborhood of Santa Sofía in the canton of Ventanas.  This Communal Bank consists of short cycle farmers who grow corn, rice, and pigeon peas.  

Victor is a farmer who grows corn.  He buys and sells in Ventanas.  His challenges include dealing with pests known as “langosta”, as well as with mice.  Victor is requesting a loan to buy farming supplies, urea, compost, and liquid treatments for weeds.  With the support of this loan, he will be able to improve his standard of living and his ability to work.  

His dream is to buy a house.  In his free time, Victor enjoys practicing sports.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies, urea, compost, and liquid treatments for weeds.

loans.name: Milton David

texts.es:
Milton David tiene 28 años de edad es casado tiene dos hijos, vive con la esposa y con los hijos en ventanas provincia de los Ríos.

Es integranbte de la VRC 27 DE OCTUBR, se encuentra ubicada en el recinto Santa Sofía, Perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas, Esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz, arroz, frejol gandul.

Milton se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, arroz, frejol gandúl. Las compras y las ventas lo hace en ventanas.

Solicita el crédito para comprar fertilizantes, insumos, líquidos , urea, abonos. Con la ayuda del crédito podrá comprar los abonos sin ningún tipo de problema porque contara con el dinero del crédito.

Los desafíos a los que se enfrenta son las plagas de la alangosta en los cultivos.

el sueño es poder comprar una casa. En el tiempo libre le gusta paracticar el deporte.
texts.en:
Milton David is 28 years old, married, and has two children.  He lives with his wife and children in the canton of Ventanas in Los Ríos Province.

Milton is a member of the October 27th Communal Bank, which is located in the neighborhood of Santa Sofía in the canton of Ventanas.  This Communal Bank consists of short cycle farmers who grow corn, rice, and pigeon peas.  

Milton is a farmer who grows corn, rice, and pigeon peas.  He buys and sells in Ventanas.  Milton is requesting a loan to buy fertilizers, farming supplies, liquid nutrients, urea, and compost.  With the support of this loan, he will be able to buy compost without any problems because he will have the money.  His challenges include dealing with pests known as “langosta” that could ruin his crops.  

His dream is to buy a piece a house.  In his free time, Milton enjoys practicing sports.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, farming supplies, liquid nutrients, urea, and compost.

loans.name: Jesse

texts.en:
Jesse owns and operates JaeUndreas, an Austin hair salon specializing in non-chemical treatments and styling. Hair styling is in his blood, Jesse said, as he comes from a family of hair stylists. Before birth, his aunt owned and operated a salon that has now been in business for about 50 years. "I've always wanted to work for myself and just kind of make my mom proud," he said. "That was my goal though I began as a cook."

Jesse sensed there was a lack of knowledge and a pool of stylists attempting non-chemical treatments, so he made it top priority to go to school and change his career. Non-chemical does not mean that he does not know how to dye hair or care for chemically treated hair. His business niche is to work with such natural hair styles as dread locks, which he has been doing for 30 years, braids, corn rows, teasing, and the like. 

Jesse had done business in Louisiana since 1996 until Hurricane Katrina devastated the state in 2005 and prompted him to re-locate to Texas.
